title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon: Key Developments and Updates”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Military structures and terrorist infrastructure; the IDF attacked terrorist targets of Hezbollah in southern Lebanon.

Fighter jets struck military structures in the Ayta ash-Shab area alongside additional terrorist infrastructure in the Einata region in southern Lebanon during the night.

Following alerts activated due to rocket and missile fire in the northern region at 05:04, an interceptor was launched towards a suspicious target, which turned out to be a false alarm. An alert for rocket and missile fire was initiated due to concerns about the potential fall of interceptor debris.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/4b2Bk1e
